title: On honor and lag
body:
New honor is ok, 2 problems i see so far. 

1. My client takes a long time to get to the post-game stats screen. It's tolerable, i just go to youtube for a bit. Problem being i miss the ONLY chance to honor. Why can't i honor my team like i have done for the last 4 years of this game? Why is there a time limit on honoring?

2. Why only one per person? What if i want to thanks everybody? What if many players did well in different areas?

Apart for that it's ok. Thanks for reading - HunteRgotbored
